title: Dog Breeds Quiz
description: Identify dog breeds from descriptions and characteristics

questions.question: Which large, friendly breed has a golden coat, loves water, and is one of America's most popular family dogs?
Which breed is known for its wrinkled face, curled tail, flat nose, and compact, muscular body?
Which herding breed is known for its intelligence, black and white coat, and incredible ability to herd sheep?
Which breed has a distinctive spotted coat, was historically used as a carriage dog, and is associated with firehouses?
Which small, long-bodied breed was originally bred to hunt badgers in their burrows and comes in standard and miniature sizes?
Which large working breed has a thick double coat, wolf-like appearance, and was originally bred to pull sleds in Alaska?
Which gentle giant breed can weigh over 150 pounds, has a massive head with droopy jowls, and is known as a 'nanny dog' for its patience with children?
Which small breed has a fluffy white coat, was a favorite of French royalty, and is known for its cheerful, playful personality?
Which breed has long, droopy ears, a keen sense of smell, and a mournful howl, and was originally bred to track rabbits?
Which elegant breed is the fastest dog in the world, has a slender build, and was historically used for coursing game?
Which breed has a blue-black tongue, a lion-like mane of fur, and originated in China over 2,000 years ago?
Which curly-coated breed comes in standard, miniature, and toy sizes, is hypoallergenic, and is known for its exceptional intelligence?
Which powerful breed was developed in Germany as a guard dog, has a black and rust coat, and is named after a tax collector?
Which short-legged herding breed is closely associated with British royalty, particularly Queen Elizabeth II?
Which large, loyal breed from Japan has a thick double coat, a curled tail, and became world-famous through the story of Hachiko?
